26 class TrajectoryCollection {
27 public:
28  // Per-robot (trajectory, priority)
29  using Entry = std::tuple<std::shared_ptr<const Trajectory>, int>;
30 
31  std::array<Entry, kNumShells> get() {
32  std::lock_guard lock(lock_);
33  return robot_trajectories_;
34  }
35 
36  void put(int robot_id, std::shared_ptr<const Trajectory> trajectory, int priority) {
37  std::lock_guard lock(lock_);
38  robot_trajectories_.at(robot_id) = std::make_tuple(std::move(trajectory), priority);
39  }
40 
41 private:
42  std::mutex lock_;
43  std::array<Entry, kNumShells> robot_trajectories_ = {};
44 };
45 
46 class SharedStateInfo {
47 public:
48  SharedStateInfo(rclcpp::Node* node) {
49  play_state_sub_ = node->create_subscription<rj_msgs::msg::PlayState>(
50  referee::topics::kPlayStatePub, rclcpp::QoS(1),
51  [this](rj_msgs::msg::PlayState::SharedPtr state) { // NOLINT
52  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
53  last_play_state_ = rj_convert::convert_from_ros(*state);
54  });
55  game_settings_sub_ = node->create_subscription<rj_msgs::msg::GameSettings>(
56  config_server::topics::kGameSettingsPub, rclcpp::QoS(1),
57  [this](rj_msgs::msg::GameSettings::SharedPtr settings) { // NOLINT
58  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
59  last_game_settings_ = rj_convert::convert_from_ros(*settings);
60  });
61  goalie_sub_ = node->create_subscription<rj_msgs::msg::Goalie>(
62  referee::topics::kGoaliePub, rclcpp::QoS(1),
63  [this](rj_msgs::msg::Goalie::SharedPtr goalie) { // NOLINT
64  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
65  last_goalie_id_ = goalie->goalie_id;
66  });
67  global_obstacles_sub_ = node->create_subscription<rj_geometry_msgs::msg::ShapeSet>(
68  planning::topics::kGlobalObstaclesPub, rclcpp::QoS(1),
69  [this](rj_geometry_msgs::msg::ShapeSet::SharedPtr global_obstacles) { // NOLINT
70  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
71  last_global_obstacles_ = rj_convert::convert_from_ros(*global_obstacles);
72  });
73  def_area_obstacles_sub_ = node->create_subscription<rj_geometry_msgs::msg::ShapeSet>(
74  planning::topics::kDefAreaObstaclesPub, rclcpp::QoS(1),
75  [this](rj_geometry_msgs::msg::ShapeSet::SharedPtr def_area_obstacles) { // NOLINT
76  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
77  last_def_area_obstacles_ = rj_convert::convert_from_ros(*def_area_obstacles);
78  });
79  world_state_sub_ = node->create_subscription<rj_msgs::msg::WorldState>(
80  vision_filter::topics::kWorldStatePub, rclcpp::QoS(1),
81  [this](rj_msgs::msg::WorldState::SharedPtr world_state) { // NOLINT
82  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
83  last_world_state_ = rj_convert::convert_from_ros(*world_state);
84  });
85  }
86 
87  [[nodiscard]] PlayState play_state() const {
88  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
89  return last_play_state_;
90  }
91  [[nodiscard]] GameSettings game_settings() const {
92  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
93  return last_game_settings_;
94  }
95  [[nodiscard]] int goalie_id() const {
96  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
97  return last_goalie_id_;
98  }
99  [[nodiscard]] rj_geometry::ShapeSet global_obstacles() const {
100  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
101  return last_global_obstacles_;
102  }
103  [[nodiscard]] rj_geometry::ShapeSet def_area_obstacles() const {
104  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
105  return last_def_area_obstacles_;
106  }
107  [[nodiscard]] const WorldState* world_state() const {
108  auto lock = std::lock_guard(mutex_);
109  return &last_world_state_;
110  }
111 
112 private:
113  rclcpp::Subscription<rj_msgs::msg::PlayState>::SharedPtr play_state_sub_;
114  rclcpp::Subscription<rj_msgs::msg::GameSettings>::SharedPtr game_settings_sub_;
115  rclcpp::Subscription<rj_msgs::msg::Goalie>::SharedPtr goalie_sub_;
116  rclcpp::Subscription<rj_geometry_msgs::msg::ShapeSet>::SharedPtr global_obstacles_sub_;
117  rclcpp::Subscription<rj_geometry_msgs::msg::ShapeSet>::SharedPtr def_area_obstacles_sub_;
118  rclcpp::Subscription<rj_msgs::msg::WorldState>::SharedPtr world_state_sub_;
119 
120  mutable std::mutex mutex_;
121  PlayState last_play_state_ = PlayState::halt();
122  GameSettings last_game_settings_;
123  int last_goalie_id_;
124  rj_geometry::ShapeSet last_global_obstacles_;
125  rj_geometry::ShapeSet last_def_area_obstacles_;
126  WorldState last_world_state_;
127 };
